mapper.select:
SELECT b.id id, b.title title, b.inserted inserted, COUNT(r.id) numOfReply, b.views views
FROM Board b LEFT JOIN Reply r ON b.id = r.board_Id GROUP BY b.id ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #{from }, #{rowPerPage }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Board (title, body, inserted, views) VALUES (#{title}, #{body}, #{inserted}, #{views})
